author: HotCocoaLover

text: Beautiful and beautiful sounding game but MAN did it suck. The battle system was completely broken and it was probably the worst example of 'unless it has ludicrously obvious boobs, it's still a guy' anime logic. Also, as a Korean produced game someone clearly didn't have a clue what the Magna Carta actually is, historically, because it has less than nothing to do with this game.

author: 101Durty

text: Oooff.. this game has a great soundtrack but this game is simply awful awful awful.  Not sure if any of you had this problem but it took about 30-60 seconds to load each you went into a battle and then another 30-60 seconds after the battle was over.  Worst performance in a game I have ever seen.  Would have been a decent game if it weren't for the load issues.
